pages.text: "Harness the Sun's eneregy!"$(p)The Solar Generators functions like how you think a solar generator would. Utilizing $(bold)direct$() sunlight, it can generate power.

Like other blocks that require direct access to sunlight, blocks such as glass can be placed above the solar generator without disrupting it.$(p)However, solid blocks like Oak Wood Planks $(bold)will$() disrupt the solar generator.
